channel.title: sealed kunai
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "sealed kunai"

item.title: Re: sealed kunai
item.content:encoded: If you used kunai on mission today you will recive new one at the dayroll(start of the day = around 2AM server time) for as long as you have Legacy bloodline and you are jonin or a sannin.

item.title: Re: sealed kunai
item.content:encoded:
tq.
but, u mean. when i use it today. then tomorrow i still can use it.
one a day for forever.
it said, i have = 1.
tq.
before i have dog tread and i lose it when i used EDUT.

item.title: Re: sealed kunai
item.content:encoded:
If you don't have a sealed kunai you will receive one.

It's item for Flying Thunder God Technique, auto-pass jutsu.

This means you can one time a day automatically success on the regular mission.

item.title: sealed kunai
item.content:encoded:
Legacy of the Hero Jonin receive one at the beginning of the day if they do not currently possess one <=== are this getting auto every morning ? what it is ?
tq
